title: PM Modi inaugurates GAIL's first CBG Plant in Jharkhand
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated GAIL's first CBG Plant in Ranchi, Jharkhand, which processes 150 tonnes of municipal solid waste daily to produce 5,000 kg of Bio-CNG and 25 tons of bio-manure. The plant aims to fuel over 600 vehicles daily, promoting clean energy and local employment.
